review: Arrived in time. Love this little device.
author: Janelle

review: Setup was relatively easy, but I have to be honest: I really haven't played around with it much. I'm still not sure how to use it.
author: P. Cusick "pc"

review: Awesome. No need for cable now :)
author: Krasimir Konov "Krasi"

review: Junk! Even with the extender, there is a lag in streaming - even with the setup being positioned directly next to my router. Roku much better!
author: Jonathan Goff

review: Really works nicely with my Netflix from my ipad and iphone.  Bought several for the home and one for my college student.
author: Sheri in Denver

review: Doesn't work with my Moto X (2nd gen). Chromecast app never finds the device. Chrome extension also can't find it, even though they are all connected to the same router and network. Wasted money.
author: Guilherme Ko Freitag

review: It would've been better if warned that this might not work on your tv, the Chromecast, nor the chromecast USB Power Cable. So, can't give you anything but a, "Never Should've Wasted My Money", too little too late.Robin
author: Robin
